subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
lead_paragraph: Ronan Tynan, a 48-year-old Irish tenor, has become stitched into the fabric of New York by his singing “God Bless America” at Yankee Stadium for most of its recent major events.
snippet: Ronan Tynan, a 48-year-old Irish tenor, has become stitched into the fabric of New York by his singing “God Bless America” at Yankee Stadium for most of its recent major events.
